title: Harmonia Macrocosmica -- Taschen
content:
Greetings,

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/dldxeb4br3yrbkv/IMG\_2895.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724065718/https:/www.dropbox.com/s/dldxeb4br3yrbkv/IMG_2895.JPG "https://www.dropbox.com/s/dldxeb4br3yrbkv/IMG\_2895.JPG")

Can anyone identify this font? It's used in Taschen's gorgeous edition of Harmonia Macrocosmica by Andreas Cellarus. Thanks in advance!

Best wishes  
Idris
author: ishamid
